alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 12:38PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Grant and southwestern Sierra Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Emory Pass, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Lorenzo, Sherman, Emory Pass, San Juan, Kingston and Iron Creek Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
